data.eml:eml: First records of Leptopezella Sinclair & Cumming (Diptera: Hybotidae: Ocydromiinae) from Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Barros, Luana Machado, Freitas-Silva, Rafael A. P., Ale-Rocha, Rosaly (2019): First records of Leptopezella Sinclair & Cumming (Diptera: Hybotidae: Ocydromiinae) from Brazil. Zootaxa 4615 (2): 397-400, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4615.2.12
